actions.recommendation: Old small surgical scars noted over the umbilical and lower abdomen. The rest of the examination was normal.
Intermittent back pain after falling in 2022. Sustained L5/S1 disc herniation. Conservative management done. He does not use medication when he has pain.
The back injury you've sustained last year still causes occasional back pain. It is advised that you continue with Physiotherapy as needed and see a Biokineticist.

To reduce your risk of chronic disease it is ideal to maintain a BMI < 25 and a waist to height ratio < 50%. Start by aiming to lose 10% of your body weight. Muscle bulk can contribute to a higher BMI and determining your body fat % may be a better indicator of your biometrics.
